sentence.Network_en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentence.Network_cn: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

sentence.Network_en: The firm is still operating under another denomination.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司改用了名称仍在继续营业.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 3): from Latin denominatio(n-), from the verb denominare (see denominate). Sense 1 dates from the mid 17th cent

entry.def: A particular denomination is a particular religious group which has slightly different beliefs from other groups within the same faith.

example.ex: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
example.tran: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

entry.def: The denomination of a banknote or coin is its official value.

example.ex: ...a pile of bank notes, mostly in small denominations.
example.tran: 其中大部分都是小面额的一沓钞票

means.word_mean: 1. a group of religious congregations having its own organization and a distinctive faith
2. a class of one kind of unit in a system of numbers or measures or weights or money;

sentences.sentence: "he flashed a fistful of bills of large denominations"

means.word_mean: 3. identifying word or words by which someone or something is called and classified or distinguished from others

auth_sentence.content: Christian guidelines vary according to denomination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Christian guidelines vary according to denomination.

auth_sentence.content: Every denomination and sect claims to act according to God's will.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every denomination and sect claims to act according to God's will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every denomination and sect claims to act according to God's will.

auth_sentence.content: My denomination frequently follows this practice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My denomination frequently follows this practice.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cog同+nomin名称,名字+al……的→adj.同名的,同姓的
ig不+nomin名称,名字+ious……的→不好的名字→可耻的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 名义上的;[金额,租金]微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: nomin名称,名字+al表形容词→adj.名义上的;[金额,租金]微不足道的
denominate[v.命名,取名]+ion表名词→n.命名,[长度,币值的]单位
ig不+nomin名称,名字+y状态→不好的名字→可耻
nomin名称,名字+ee被动的人→被提名的人
de给予+nomin名称,名字+ate表动词→给予名称
nomin名称,名字+ate表动词→v.提名,任命

sentences.en: The service was attended by Christians of all denominations.
sentences.cn: 这次礼拜仪式各教派的基督徒都参加了。
